include_document_css._COMMENT_1: whether to include dojo file document.css in new html files
include_document_css._COMMENT_2: value can be set independently for desktop and mobile apps
include_document_css._COMMENT_3: where an app is mobile if it includes at least one dojo mobile widget
include_document_css._COMMENT_5: if null (or not specified), then use Maqetta default behavior
